text: Gal Gadot joined Jimmy Fallon on “ The Tonight Show ” Tuesday night and showed off her lying prowess. Insert lasso of truth joke here ( we know you were thinking it ). Even Gadot made it. The “ Wonder Woman ” star played “ Box of Lies ” — a “ Tonight Show ” game where Fallon and a guest attempted to stump each other on the contents of a mystery box. Most of the items, however, are hard to describe even truthfully. Also Read :'Wonder Woman'First Reactions :'the Best DCEU Film to Date'Gadot won the game, but granted, some of the items made trying to confuse Fallon really easy.
